column2: -nur is a Quenya suffix added to names to indicate faithful service or servitude.

column1: * Eärendur (Lord of Andúnië)/Earnur = "Servant of the Belegaer
* Elendur (son of Isildur) = "Servant of the Elves"
* http://www.uib.no/People/hnohf/qlist.htm Quenya Corpus Wordlist edited by Helge Fauskanger
